text: Bizir kam bangɨn, kɨ dɨmagarir kamɨn an adarazir gumaziba bar me kuavaremegham. Puvatɨghtɨma, kɨ Godɨn azaraghtɨ, a na mɨsueghtɨ kɨ aremegham.”25:22 Bar fomɨra, me Hibrun akamɨn aven itir akar kam, Grikɨn akamɨn a gɨra. Ezɨ Grikɨn akam ghaze, “God na mɨsueghtɨ, kɨ aremegham.” Fofozir gumazir avɨriba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨgha ghaze, akar kam, “kɨ uabɨ,” a uaghan Hibrun akamɨn aven kagh iti. Egha me gɨn ghaze, Devit men atrivir aghuim. Egha me datɨrɨghɨn a giragha ghaze, “nan apanibara.”
